Q: How quickly can the Product Option SKU module be set up?
A: The module is easy to install and configure. You can assign SKUs to product options right from the product edit page—setup takes only a few minutes.

Q: Can Custom Option Pro run on OpenCart 3.x?
A: Yes, Custom Option Pro supports OpenCart versions not specified.

Q: Does the Google Analytics & Facebook Pixel Event module support tracking for guest users?
A: Yes, the module tracks both registered and guest users. It captures key events like add-to-cart, checkout, and purchases for all visitors, enabling complete analytics.

Q: Can Product Option Model run on OpenCart 3.x?
A: Yes, Product Option Model supports OpenCart versions not specified.

Q: What are the benefits of using the Paytrail Payment Method module for Finnish e-commerce?
A: It offers local payment options like Finnish online banks, cards, and mobile wallets. It’s compliant with Finnish regulations and builds trust with local customers.

Q: Is it safe to install Cod Partial Payment on OpenCart 4.x?
A: Yes, Cod Partial Payment supports 2.

Q: Does OpenCart 1.5.x allow Multivendor Membership/Subscription ADDON to work properly?
A: Sorry, this module can't be used with OpenCart 1.5x. More info is available at https://www.opencartextensions.in.

Q: Is the Unlimited Shipping Method module compatible with OpenCart versions 3.x and above?
A: Yes, the Unlimited Shipping Method module is fully compatible with OpenCart versions 3.x and above, ensuring smooth integration and reliable performance across the latest store setups.

Q: Will Booking and Reservation  System work with OpenCart 1.5.x?

Q: Can store admins control which products are linked in the Product Switcher Pro module.?
A: Yes, admins can manually assign which products are linked using the module. You can define product switch behavior based on category, brand, or specific selections.

Q: Can the Cod Partial Payment module be used during special sale campaigns?
A: The Cod Partial Payment module is useful for OpenCart store owners as it the COD Payment fee extension is based on the COD payment gateway in OpenCart. This extension allows the admin to charge a fee on full order payment when customers use COD as payment. It supports all shipping payment methods present on your website. It also supports different shipping gateways too.

Q: Does the Cod OTP Verification module integrate into the order confirmation step?
A: Yes, the OTP verification is triggered before finalizing the order. Only after the correct OTP is entered will the system proceed with confirming the COD order.

Q: Where can I find the opencart customer group product quantity module  online?

Q: Is Vendor And Admin Order Notification (Multi Vendor Addon) officially compatible with OpenCart 2.x?
A: Yes, Vendor And Admin Order Notification (Multi Vendor Addon) supports 10.

Q: Give me the OpenCart versions supported by Australia Post Shipping
A: The Australia Post Shipping module supports OpenCart versions 2.x, 3.x and 4x, including the latest stable releases like 3.0.3.8, and 4x. Always check the module page for specific version notes.

Q: How does the Warehouse Stock And Order Management module affect stock visibility?
A: It improves stock visibility by showing product quantities across multiple warehouses. Admins can track and allocate inventory from different locations, ensuring better stock control and order fulfillment.

Q: What’s the main benefit of the Fixed Currency On Product Price module?
A: It ensures stable product pricing across currencies. Customers see consistent prices regardless of exchange rate fluctuations, improving transparency and trust.

Q: Which types of payments are supported by the Stripe Payment Gateway module?
A: The module supports credit/debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Klarna, iDEAL, Afterpay, SEPA, and more. It accommodates a wide range of global and regional payment options.

Q: Does the Multivendor Purchase Order module store historical purchase order data?
A: Yes, the module keeps a record of all past purchase orders. Admins and vendors can view historical data, track order status, and analyze supplier performance.

Q: How does the Delivery Boy Management module improve delivery performance?
A: It improves performance by allowing order assignments, real-time tracking, and delivery status updates—ensuring accountability and reducing delays in local fulfillment.

Q: Is multi-language support available in the Product Option SKU module?
A: Yes, the module supports OpenCart’s multi-language features, ensuring that option-related SKUs and labels display correctly in all supported store languages.

Q: How does the Product Option Model module improve the user experience?
A: It ensures that selected product options display accurate model numbers and SKUs, making order summaries more precise and giving customers confidence in what they’re purchasing.

Q: Can you revert or re-import corrected discount data using the Availability Time Slots module.?
A: No, the Availability Time Slots module is designed for delivery scheduling, not discount data management. For importing corrected pricing or discounts, a dedicated discount module should be used.

Q: How is chat history managed in the Live Chat module?
A: You can access past conversations in the live chat history section.

Q: Does the Multivendor OTP Verification ADDON module impact the vendor experience?
A: The Multivendor OTP Verification ADDON module provides OpenCart stores with tools such as The module's admin panel is simple yet powerful. It contains most of the settings in one place to configure easily like SMS messages, setup SSL, URL, and SMS methods like POST or GET. The vendor verified the email or mobile number of the vendor after the vendor gets OTP in his email or mobile that.

Q: How does the Product Label Maker module help highlight special products?
A: The module lets you add custom labels like “New,” “Hot,” or “Best Seller” on product images. This draws attention to specific items and boosts visibility in listings or search results.

Q: I want to see more about Welcome Introduction Module.
A: The Welcome Introduction Module displays a pop-up message or banner when users land on your store. It’s great for showcasing promotions, store info, or onboarding messages, and includes cookie-based control to avoid repeated display.

Q: Is the Fixed Currency On Product Price module helpful for global pricing strategies?
A: Yes, it allows you to set consistent prices per currency, eliminating the impact of fluctuating exchange rates—ideal for international pricing control and regional promotions.

Q: Can the Multivendor Purchase Order module help forecast stock needs?
A: The Multivendor Purchase Order module is useful for OpenCart store owners as it overview Of TMD OpenCart Multi Vendor Purchased Order Extension It allows you to easily coordinate your purchase orders with your supplier directly from your administration panel. Skip the hassle of manually submitting your purchase orders to your supplier. This system is essential for an OpenCart.

Q: What is the purpose of the Paytrail Payment Method module in OpenCart?
A: The module enables OpenCart stores to accept secure payments via Paytrail. It supports Finnish online banks, cards, and other payment methods tailored for businesses in Finland and beyond.

Q: Does the Product Label Maker module support label positioning?
A: Yes, you can choose the label’s position on the product image—top-left, top-right, bottom-left, or bottom-right—for better alignment with your store’s design.

Q: What happens if a language or currency is not linked in the Match Currency with Language Vice-Versa module?
A: If no link is configured, the module won’t make automatic changes. The store will use the default language and currency settings without forcing any conversions.

Q: What devices support the (PWA) Progressive Web Applications module features?
A: The PWA module works on all modern smartphones, tablets, and desktop browsers. Users can install your store as an app on Android and Chrome-based devices. IOS mobile and MAC devices are not compatible with PWA

Q: Can I apply shipping rates to a specific country using the Unlimited Shipping Method module?
A: Yes, you can target specific countries using geo zones. Each shipping method can be configured to apply only to selected countries or regions.

Q: How can the Daily Deal module boost online sales?

Q: What if I want to disable Store Locator temporarily?
A: You can disable the module from the admin panel under Extensions → Modules. This hides the Store Locator from the frontend without uninstalling or deleting any data.

Q: Does the Advance Product Option Pro module add extra fields to the product edit form?
A: Yes, the module enhances the product edit form by adding advanced option fields such as images, dependencies, tooltips, and pricing control for better product customization.

Q: Can refunds be processed through the Stripe Payment Gateway module?
A: Yes, the Stripe Payment Gateway module supports full and partial refunds directly from the OpenCart admin panel. This streamlines post-sale service without needing to log into the Stripe dashboard.

A: Yes, Auto Change / Switch Customer Group supports 2x, 3x.

Q: What types of users benefit most from the Multiple Wishlist module?
A: The Multiple Wishlist module is especially beneficial for returning customers, planners, and gift buyers. It lets users organize products into separate wishlists by theme, occasion, or purpose, making it easier to manage future purchases.

Q: Can you customize the number of items shown in the Recently Purchased / Latest Purchases module?

By showcasing recently bought products, you offer your visitors a glimpse into trending items and popular choices.

Q: What makes the Paytrail Payment Method module unique among OpenCart payment modules?
A: The Paytrail module is uniquely optimized for Finnish and European markets, supporting a wide range of local banks, mobile payments, and invoice options, all in one secure solution tailored for regional compliance.

A: Paytrail stands out by offering seamless integration with local payment providers in the Nordics, combined with real-time transactions, refunds, and multi-language support, making it ideal for region-specific ecommerce.

Q: What makes the Paytrail Payment module different from other OpenCart payment modules?
A: Unlike generic payment gateways, Paytrail provides localized Finnish and EU payment methods, ensuring a better checkout experience for local shoppers and compliance with regional banking standards.

A: Yes, while it's optimized for Nordic markets, the Paytrail module supports international cards and multi-currency transactions, making it suitable for global ecommerce with a strong European focus.
